mapper.select: SELECT p.product_num, p.title, p.price, p.content AS description, p.view_count, ss.status_text AS product_status, p.status_code, p.category_code, p.input_date, p.modify_date, p.delete_flag, s_p.addr, p.thumbnail, st.store_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE product_num = p.product_num) AS bookmark_count, po.BUYER_ID, ad.address AS destination_addr, ad.address_detail AS destination_detail FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN sell_place s_p ON p.product_num = s_p.product_num LEFT OUTER JOIN sell_status ss ON p.status_code = ss.status_code LEFT OUTER JOIN store st ON p.store_num = st.store_num LEFT OUTER JOIN product_ORDER po ON p.product_num = po.product_num LEFT OUTER JOIN address ad ON po.ORDER_ID = ad.ORDER_ID WHERE p.product_num = #{product_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET status_code = #{statusCode} WHERE product_num = #{productNo}
UPDATE product SET delete_flag = 'Y', /* [수정] '1'에서 'Y'로 변경 */ delete_text = #{deleteReason}, modify_date = SYSDATE WHERE product_num = #{productNo}
